name: E.T.C.S
description:
"You stumble across a website that seems relatively normal. However, as you discover more pages, you find that things go deeper than it seems. 

They are out there. 

They see you."

The ETCS Initiative is a web-based interactive horror program based on a story of a research group pursuing aliens. 

Read through each page carefully to uncover the mystery and solve the codes.

**must have node.js to run the package**

Created for IMD3006 in 2022 by Mackenzie Darling and Danielle Cole
